Reference

All functions

angl_cor()

Adjusted big_cor function with different scaling function. In comparison to big_scale(), we don't stop the scaling if there is a gene with 0 variance. #' Correlation

anglemania()

Compute Critical Angles Between Genes Across Samples in an anglemania_object

anglemania_object-class anglemania_object

anglemania_object - Class for Storing and Processing Gene Expression Data

show(<anglemania_object>) matrix_list() `matrix_list<-`() dataset_key() batch_key() data_info() angl_weights() `angl_weights<-`() list_stats() `list_stats<-`() intersect_genes() `intersect_genes<-`() get_anglemania_genes() add_unique_batch_key()

Display Summary Information for an anglemania_object

big_mat_list_mean()

Calculates the mean for each element of a matrix from a list of FBMs

create_anglemania_object()

Create an anglemania_object from a Seurat or SingleCellExperiment Object

extract_angles()

Calculate cosine angle between genes

extract_rows_for_unique_genes()

Extract Unique Genes from Gene Pairs Data Frame

factorise()

Factorize Angle Matrices into Z-Scores

get_dstat()

Compute mean and standard deviation of the correlation matrix

get_list_stats()

Calculate statistical measures from a list of FBMs

integrate_by_features()

Integrate Samples in a Seurat Object Using Selected Features from anglemania_object Object

integrate_seurat_list()

Integrate a List of Seurat Objects Using Selected Features

sce_example()

Generate example SingleCellExperiment object

select_genes()

Select Genes Based on Statistical Thresholds from an anglemania_object

sparse_to_fbm()

Convert a sparse matrix into a file-backed matrix (FBM)
